title: "Meta open-sources AI-model - ImageBind - that combines six data types"
excerpt: "Meta has announced an open-source AI model called ImageBind that connects strings of data, including text, audio, visual data, temperature and movement readings. The core concept of research is linking data into a single multi-dimensional index, a report by The Verge revealed."
